styleUrlsData.data:
@import "./../../../../mixins.sass"

$base-color: #ddd
$shine-color: #e8e8e8
$animation-duration: 1.6s
$grey: #bdbbbb

app-book
  margin-left: 30px

  @include mobile
    margin-left: 0px

  &:nth-child(3n+1)
    margin-left: 0px
    
    @include desk
      margin-left: 30px

    @include tablet
      margin-left: 30px
    
    @include mobile
      margin-left: 0px

  &:nth-child(2n+1)
    @include desk
      margin-left: 0px

    @include tablet
      margin-left: 0px
    
    @include mobile
      margin-left: 0px

mat-paginator
  width: 100%
  margin-top: 25px

.container
  width: 100%
  display: flex
  flex-wrap: wrap
  margin-bottom: 50px

@keyframes hiding
  0%
    opacity: 1
  100%
    opacity: 0

.shadow-book
  margin-top: 30px
  margin-left: 30px
  position: relative
  background: #ececec
  width: 300px
  height: 375px
  clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 0% 100%, 100% 100%, 100% 0%)
  opacity: 1
  animation: hiding 1.5s linear
  
  @include tablet
    width: 275px

  @include mobile
    width: 275px
    margin-left: 0px

  .gradient
    background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, $base-color 0px, $shine-color 40px, $base-color 80px) 
    height: 130%
    width: 140%
    transform: rotate(15deg) translate(-20%, -10%)
    animation: loading $animation-duration infinite linear

  .pad-cont
    padding: 15px 15px 0px 15px

  .img
    height: 170px
    width: 270px
    transition: 0.6s
    box-sizing: border-box
    margin-bottom: 10px
    background: $grey

    @include tablet
      width: 245px

    @include mobile
      width: 245px

  .title
    height: 25px
    width: 100%
    background: $grey

  .text
    margin-top: 10px
    height: 50px
    width: 100%
    background: $grey

  .price
    margin-top: 10px
    width: 75px
    height: 25px
    background: $grey
    float: right

  .genres
    width: 100%
    display: flex

    .genre
      margin-top: 20px
      height: 25px
      width: 110px
      background: $grey
      margin-left: 15px

  &:nth-child(3n+1)
    margin-left: 0px

    @include tablet
      margin-left: 30px

    @include mobile
      margin-left: 0px

  &:nth-child(2n+1)

    @include tablet
      margin-left: 0px

    @include mobile
      margin-left: 0px

@keyframes loading
  0%
    background-position: 0px
  100%
    background-position: 300px
    
    
.not-found
  margin-top: 40px
  box-sizing: border-box
  height: 200px
  width: 100%
  background: #ececec
  display: flex
  justify-content: center
  align-items: center

h1

styleUrlsData.data:
@import "./../../../../mixins.sass"
@import "./../../../../variables.sass"

h1
  margin-block-end: 0em
  margin-top: 40px

  @include mobile
    font-size: 22px


.container
  width: 1400px
  top: 70px
  position: relative
  margin: 0px auto
  margin-top: 10px
  position: relative
  display: flex
  justify-content: space-between

  @include desk
    width: 960px

  @include tablet
    width: 580px
    flex-direction: column-reverse

  @include mobile
    width: 275px
    flex-direction: column-reverse

  .content-block
    width: 960px
    position: relative

    @include desk
      width: 630px

    @include tablet
      width: 100%

    @include mobile
      width: 100%

    .chart-cont
      width: 100%
      background: white
      box-shadow: $shadow
      margin-top: 20px
      position: relative

      @include mobile
        display: none

      .wrapper
        width: 94%
        margin: 0px auto
        padding-top: 20px
        padding-bottom: 20px

        h3
          margin-block-start: 0em

        canvas
          height: 350px
          width: 100%

          @include desk
            height: 300px 

    .info-cont
      width: 100%
      height: auto
      margin-top: 25px
      background: $blue
      box-shadow: $shadow
      color: white
      position: relative

      .wrapper
        width: 92%
        margin: 0px auto
        position: relative
        padding-top: 20px
        padding-bottom: 20px
        

        .info-cols
          position: relative
          width: 700px
          height: 200px
          margin: 0px auto
          display: flex
          justify-content: space-between

          @include desk
            height: 160px
            width: 550px

          @include tablet
            height: 140px
            width: 500px

          @include mobile
            width: 100%
            flex-direction: column
            height: auto
            align-items: center

          .delimeter
            height: 140px
            margin-top: 30px
            width: 3px
            background: white

            @include desk
              height: 90px

            @include tablet
              height: 90px

            @include mobile
              width: 120px
              height: 3px

          .data-el
            height: 200px
            width: 200px
            display: flex
            justify-content: center
            align-items: center
            flex-direction: column
            cursor: pointer
            user-select: none

            @include desk
              height: 160px
              width: 160px
            
            @include tablet
              height: 140px
              width: 140px

            &:hover
              .count
                background: #111138
                transform: scale(1.05, 1.05)

            .count
              height: 100px
              width: 100px 
              border-radius: 50%
              font-size: 45px
              display: flex
              justify-content: center
              align-items: center
              transition: 0.4s
              background: #4f4fc4

              @include desk
                font-size: 38px

              @include tablet
                font-size: 35px

            .text
              margin-top: 20px
              font-size: 18px
              font-weight: 400

              @include desk
                font-size: 16px
              
              @include tablet
                font-size: 14px

        .email-title
          font-size: 20px
          font-weight: 500

        p
          font-size: 14px
          font-weight: 300

        .buttons
          width: 300px
          display: flex
          justify-content: space-between

          @include mobile
            flex-direction: column
            height: 95px
            width: 100%

        button
          border-radius: 25px
          height: 40px
          font-weight: 400

          &.white
            width: 200px
            color: $blue
          
            @include mobile
              width: 100%

          &.dark
            color: white
            background: #111138
            width: 80px

            @include mobile
              width: 100%

  .info-col
    width: 400px

    @include desk
      width: 280px

    @include tablet
      width: 100%

    @include mobile
      width: 100%

    .info-block
      background: white
      width: 100%
      height: auto
      position: relative
      box-shadow: $shadow
      margin-top: 20px

      .wrapper
        width: 350px
        height: auto
        margin: 0px auto
        padding-top: 25px
        padding-bottom: 25px
        position: relative
        display: flex
        align-items: center
        flex-direction: column
        
        @include desk
          width: 250px
          padding-top: 15px
          padding-bottom: 15px

        @include tablet
          width: 90%
          padding-top: 18px
          padding-bottom: 18px

        @include mobile
          width: 90%
          padding-top: 15px
          padding-bottom: 15px

        .city
          text-align: center

        .avatar
          height: 200px
          width: 200px
          background: #e85348
          border-radius: 50%
          margin: 0px auto
          position: relative

          @include desk
            height: 150px
            width: 150px
          
          img
            height: 100%
            width: 100%

        .edit
          width: 100%
          // margin: 0px auto
          margin-top: 15px
          height: 50px
          border-radius: 0px

          @include desk
            height: 40px

          @include tablet
            height: 40px

          @include mobile
            height: 40px

        .info
          padding-top: 10px
          border-radius: 0px

        .name
          font-size: 30px
          font-weight: 800
          text-align: center
          margin-top: 10px

  .info-link
    cursor: pointer
    height: 70px
    width: 100%
    background: white
    box-shadow: $shadow
    margin-top: 20px
    outline: none
    font-size: 16px
    font-weight: 400
    border-radius: 0px

    @include desk
      height: 50px

    @include tablet
      height: 60px

    @include mobile
      height: 60px

    mat-icon
      width: 24px
      height: 24px
      margin-left: 10px

components.templateData:
{{ author.firstName }} {{ author.lastName }}

Biography

William Shakespeare (bapt. 26 April 1564 23 April 1616)[a] was an English playwright, poet, and actor, widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and the world's greatest dramatist.[2][3][4] He is often called England's national poet and the "Bard of Avon" (or simply "the Bard").[5][b] His extant works, including collaborations, consist of some 39 plays,[c] 154 sonnets, two long narrative poems, and a few other verses, some of uncertain authorship. His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.[7] They also continue to be studied and reinterpreted.

Shakespeare was born and raised in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire. At the age of 18, he married Anne Hathaway, with whom he had three children: Susanna and twins Hamnet and Judith. Sometime between 1585 and 1592, he began a successful career in London as an actor, writer, and part-owner of a playing company called the Lord Chamberlain's Men, later known as the King's Men. At age 49 (around 1613), he appears to have retired to Stratford, where he died three years later. Few records of Shakespeare's private life survive; this has stimulated considerable speculation about such matters as his physical appearance, his sexuality, his religious beliefs, and whether the works attributed to him were written by others.

@import "./../../../../mixins.sass"

mat-card::ng-deep
  margin-top: 30px
  padding: 0px !important
  opacity: 1px
  animation: showing 1s linear
  outline: none
  width: 300px

  @include tablet
    width: 275px

  @include mobile
    width: 275px

@keyframes showing
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1

.title
  height: 28px
  overflow: hidden

.container
  height: 375px
  cursor: pointer
  width: 300px

  @include tablet
    width: 275px

  @include mobile
    width: 275px

  &:hover
    .hover-cover
      background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5)

  .pad-cont
    padding: 15px 15px 0px 15px
    outline: none

  .content
    height: 50px
    overflow: hidden
    margin-bottom: 6px
  
  .hover-cover
    height: 100%
    width: 100%
    transition: 0.4s

  .img
    position: relative
    height: 170px
    width: 270px
    transition: 0.6s
    box-sizing: border-box
    margin-bottom: 10px
    background-color: #9ccfff
    background-size: cover
    background-position: center

    @include tablet
      width: 245px

    @include mobile
      width: 245px

  .flex-cont

  .price

    font-weight: 700

  .genres

components.templateData:
{{ genre.name }}

Description

William Shakespeare (bapt. 26 April 1564 23 April 1616) was an English playwright, poet, and actor, widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and the world's greatest dramatist. He is often called England's national poet and the "Bard of Avon" (or simply "the Bard"). His extant works, including collaborations, consist of some 39 plays, 154 sonnets, two long narrative poems, and a few other verses, some of uncertain authorship. His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright. They also continue to be studied and reinterpreted.

Shakespeare was born and raised in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire. At the age of 18, he married Anne Hathaway, with whom he had three children: Susanna and twins Hamnet and Judith. Sometime between 1585 and 1592, he began a successful career in London as an actor, writer, and part-owner of a playing company called the Lord Chamberlain's Men, later known as the King's Men. At age 49 (around 1613), he appears to have retired to Stratford, where he died three years later. Few records of Shakespeare's private life survive; this has stimulated considerable speculation about such matters as his physical appearance, his sexuality, his religious beliefs, and whether the works attributed to him were written by others.

.main-cont
  position: relative
  width: 100%
  height: 100%
  min-height: 600px
  background-image: url('../../../../assets/images/background.png')
  background-repeat: none
  background-size: cover
  background-position: center 

  @include mobile
    display: flex
    flex-direction: column
    justify-content: center
    background-position: 550px 0px 

  @include tablet
    display: flex
    flex-direction: column
    justify-content: center
    background-position: 550px 0p

  .info-text
    position: absolute
    top: 150px
    left: 150px

    @include mobile
      position: relative
      top: 0px
      left: 0px
      width: 320px
      margin: 0px auto

    @include tablet
      width: 500px
      position: relative
      top: 0px
      left: 0px
      margin: 0px auto


    @include desk
      top: 120px
      left: 120px

    .title
      color: $blue
      font-size: 6em
      font-weight: 900

      @include mobile
        font-size: 40px
        width: 320px

      @include tablet
        text-align: center
        font-size: 70px

      @include desk
        font-size: 6em

  .button-line
    height: 60px
    width: 100%
    position: absolute
    bottom: 50px
    display: flex
    justify-content: center

    @include mobile
      position: relative
      bottom: 0px
      margin-top: 20px

components.name: SignInContainer

styleUrlsData.data:
@import "./../../../../mixins.sass"
@import "./../../../../variables.sass"

.container
  width: 100%
  height: 100%
  position: absolute
  background-image: url('../../../../assets/images/server.jpg')
  background-size: cover
  background-repeat: no-repeat
  background-position: center
  overflow-y: auto
  min-height: 720px

  @include mobile
    display: flex
    justify-content: center
    align-items: center

  @include tablet
    display: flex
    justify-content: center
    align-items: center

form
  background: white
  width: 500px
  height: 100%
  display: flex
  justify-content: center
  align-items: center
  flex-direction: column
  position: relative
  transition: 0.9s
  transform: translateX(-500px)

  @include mobile
    width: 350px
    height: 650px
    box-shadow: $shadow

  @include tablet
    height: 600px
    box-shadow: $shadow
    transform: translateX(-1000px)

  &.loaded
    transform: translateX(0px)

  &.leave
    transform: translateX(-500px)

    @include tablet
      transform: translateX(-1000px)

  h1
    font-size: 50px
    width: fit-content

  .note
    position: absolute
    left: 70px
    bottom: 20px
    color: #636363

mat-form-field
  width: 80%

button[type="submit"]
  width: 80%
  height: 50px
  font-size: 18px
  margin-top: 25px

.link
  margin-top: 10px
  font-size: 15px
  text-decoration: none
  color: #4982b8

.text
  position: absolute
  bottom: 50px
  right: 100px
  color: white
  width: 550px
  font-size: 66px
  font-weight: 700

  @include mobile
    display: none

  @include tablet
    display: none

  @include desk
    right: 75px
    bottom: 35px
    width: 370px
    font-size: 46px
  
  .line
    clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 0% 100%, 0% 100%, 0% 0%)
    transition: 0.9s

    &.loaded
      clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 0% 100%, 100% 100%, 100% 0%)

    &.leave
      clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 0% 100%, 0% 100%, 0% 0%)

  span
    color: #54d6ba

@keyframes slide
  0%
    transform: translateX(-500px)
  100%
    transform: translateX(0px)

@keyframes tablet-slide
  0%
    transform: translateX(-1000px)
  100%
    transform: translateX(0px)

@keyframes slide-text
  0%
    clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 0% 100%, 0% 100%, 0% 0%)
  100%
    clip-path: polygon(0% 0%, 0% 100%, 100% 100%, 100% 0%)

@import "./../../../../mixins.sass"
@import "./../../../../variables.sass"

.uppercase
  text-transform: uppercase

.card-wrapper
  width: 100%
  height: 300px
  display: flex
  align-items: center
  justify-content: center

  .wrapper
    width: 320px
    height: auto 
    margin: 0px auto
    position: relative

    @include mobile
      width: 270px

    .inputs
      height: 100px
      width: 100%
      margin-top: 110px

      @include mobile
        margin-top: 55px

      .input-line
        // background: #ececec
        height: 40px
        width: 100%
        display: flex
        justify-content: space-between

        .md-2
          width: 60%

        .md-1
          width: 25%

        &:nth-child(2)
          margin-top: 15px

        input
          width: 100%
          height: 40px
          border-width: 0px
          border-radius: 5px
          background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.24)
          font-size: 16px
          padding-top: 4px
          color: white
          box-sizing: border-box
          padding-left: 8px
          outline: none

          &.errored
            border: 2px solid #ff3936

          &::placeholder
            color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.48)

  .sm-1
    width: 15%

    @include mobile
      width: 50px

  .cards
    width: 470px
    height: 260px
    position: relative

    @include mobile
      width: 100%

    .card
      position: absolute
      width: 370px
      height: 230px
      border-radius: 20px
      background: linear-gradient(167.6deg, #B8C7FF -9.78%, #474CE4 107.04%)

      @include mobile
        width: 100%
        height: 160px
        border-radius: 10px

      &:nth-child(1)
        z-index: 300

      &:nth-child(2)
        right: 0px
        bottom: 0px
        z-index: 100

        @include mobile
          left: 0px

        .input-line
          justify-content: flex-end !important

  .magnit
    height: 45px
    width: 100%
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.48)
    position: absolute
    top: 40px


  .text
    font-weight: 500
    font-size: 14px
    color: white
    margin-top: 30px

  .logo
    position: absolute
    top: 15px
    height: 50px
    width: 70px

    @include mobile
      width: 50px
      height: 30px

    &.logo-l
      left: 30px

      @include mobile
        left: 15px

    &.logo-r
      right: 30px

      @include mobile
        right: 15px

    img
      width: 100%
      height: auto
